note: Hosted campaign themed event. On October 2nd 2018 we held our EGM (extraordinary general meeting), an event we host every October in our college. At this event we outlined our plans for the year ahead, and sought feedback from students. At the EGM we held elections for members to join our committee. We elected 9 new members to our committee who all confirmed they support the mission of SSDP to see reform to Drug Policy. Furthermore our new members expressed passion in seeing our harm-reduction campaign for the year ahead come to fruition. We have now publicly committed to a rigorous year of promoting harm-reduction policies for the year ahead. Also mentioned at the EGM by our Chairperson was that next year (April-May 2019) we will engage with local city and county councillors to adopt a pro-harm reduction stance when running for council elections which are set to take place in Summer 2019. Facebook link to our event - https://www.facebook.com/events/2175798829298372/
